description: Fix the divide function to correctly divide a by b instead of dividing by 0. Also add proper error handling for division by zero to raise a more informative error. - Fix the division logic to use parameter b instead of hardcoded 0, and add zero division error handling

metadata.solution_description: Fix the divide function to correctly divide a by b instead of dividing by 0. Also add proper error handling for division by zero to raise a more informative error.
